mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: WITH AM AS( SELECT A.*, M.name AS writerName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id} ) SELECT AM.* , IFNULL(SUM(R.point), 0) AS sumReactionPoint , IFNULL(SUM(IF(R.point > 0, R.point, 0)),0) AS likeReactionPoint , IFNULL(SUM(IF(R.point < 0, R.point, 0)),0) AS hateReactionPoint FROM AM LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS R ON R.relTypeCode = 'article' AND R.relId = AM.id GROUP BY AM.id
